Austin, TX - http://appsumo.com

AppSumo provides daily deals for web geeks. We're growing and we need some more Sumos around the office who are into startups, having an immediate impact, and burritos. Looking for a range of awesome people:

From http://appsumo.com/hireme

Python Developer - Build cool stuff (refer someone to this position and get 5 years of Chipotle!)

Question: Favorite program to write code in?

------

Biz-Dev Sumos (2 openings) - Work with awesome companies and people to promote their businesses.

Question: Favorite web app today?

------

Marketing Associate Sumo - Help tell the world about AppSumo.

Question: Favorite marketing blog or books?

------

Design Sumo - Help us look sexy with innovative creatives. See your designs put to the test immediately.

Question: What inspires your design?

------

If you want in, email hireme at appsumo dot com, including the job title in the subject line and your answer to the question.

PS: We're a bunch of goofballs who love what we do, so it just might help if you are too.
